00030 const char *const logLevelNames( LogLevel level )
00031 {
00032     switch( level ) {
00033     case error:
00034         return "error";
00035     case warning:
00036         return "warning";
00037     case info:
00038         return "info";
00039     case verbose_info:
00040         return "verbose";
00041     }
00042 
00043     return "//no_log//";
00044 }
00045 
00046 void MessageHandlerBase::stopBelow( LogLevel stop )
00047 {
00048     m_stop_below = stop;
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool MessageHandlerBase::requestStop( LogLevel _level )
00052 {
00053     if ( m_stop_below > _level ) {
00054 #ifdef WIN32
00055         LOG( Debug, error ) << "Sorry stopping is not supported on Win32";
00056         return false;
00057 #else
00058         return kill( getpid(), SIGTSTP ) == 0;
00059 #endif
00060     } else
00061         return false;
00062 }
00063 
00064 std::string Message::strTime()const
00065 {
00066     return boost::posix_time::to_simple_string( m_timeStamp );
00067 }
00068 
00069 Message::Message( std::string object, std::string module, std::string file, int line, LogLevel level, boost::weak_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> _commitTo )
00070     : commitTo( _commitTo ),
00071       m_object( object ),
00072       m_module( module ),
00073       m_file( file ),
00074       m_timeStamp( boost::posix_time::second_clock::universal_time() ),
00075       m_line( line ),
00076       m_level( level )
00077 {}
00078 
00079 Message::Message( const Message &src ) //we need a custom copy-constructor, because the copy-contructor of ostringstream is private
00080     : std::ostringstream( src.str() ),
00081       commitTo( src.commitTo ),
00082       m_object( src.m_object ),
00083       m_module( src.m_module ),
00084       m_file( src.m_file ),
00085       m_subjects( src.m_subjects ),
00086       m_timeStamp( src.m_timeStamp ),
00087       m_line( src.m_line ),
00088       m_level( src.m_level )
00089 {}
00090 
00091 Message::~Message()
00092 {
00093     if ( shouldCommit() ) {
00094         commitTo.lock()->commit( *this );
00095         str( "" );
00096         clear();
00097         commitTo.lock()->requestStop( m_level );
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 std::string Message::merge()const
00103 {
00104     std::string ret( str() );
00105     size_t found = std::string::npos;
00106     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator subj = m_subjects.begin();
00107 
00108     if ( ( found = ret.find( "{o}" ) ) != std::string::npos )
00109         ret.replace( found, 3, m_object );
00110 
00111     found = 0;
00112 
00113     while ( ( found = ret.find( "{s}", found ) ) != std::string::npos )
00114         ret.replace( found, 3, std::string( "\"" ) + *( subj++ ) + "\"" );
00115 
00116     return ret;
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool Message::shouldCommit()const
00120 {
00121     if( str().empty() )
00122         return false;
00123 
00124     const boost::shared_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> buff( commitTo.lock() );
00125 
00126     if ( buff )
00127         return ( buff->m_level >= m_level );
00128     else return false;
00129 }
00130 
00131 LogLevel MessageHandlerBase::m_stop_below = error;
00132 
00133 
00134 } //namespace _internal
00135 
00136 std::ostream *DefaultMsgPrint::o = &::std::cerr;
00137 void DefaultMsgPrint::commit( const _internal::Message &mesg )
00138 {
00139     if( last.empty() || last != mesg.str() ) {
00140         *o << mesg.m_module << ":" << _internal::logLevelNames( mesg.m_level );
00141 #ifndef NDEBUG //if with debug-info
00142         *o << "[" << mesg.m_file.leaf() << ":" << mesg.m_line << "] "; //print the file and the line
00143 #else
00144         *o << "[" << mesg.m_object << "] "; //print the object/method
00145 #endif //NDEBUG
00146         *o << mesg.merge(); //print the message itself
00147         *o << std::endl;
00148         last = mesg.str();
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void DefaultMsgPrint::setStream( ::std::ostream &_o )
00153 {
00154     o->flush();
00155     o = &_o;
00156 }

00158 }
